data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,897 believers in West Darfur to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Darfur, Sudan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in West Darfur, Sudan that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in West Darfur, Sudan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 3,897 believers in the state of West Darfur.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Masalit people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, please defend the 3,897 believers in West Darfur against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of West Darfur to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.section_summary:
the state of West Darfur, Sudan has a population of 1,006,800.

We estimate West Darfur has 3,897 people who might know Jesus, 46,294 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 956,609 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in West Darfur, Sudan, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
